scripts.zip-nails: INFERNO_APP_CONTENT='nails.js' npm run build && zip -r nails.zip build
scripts.zip-deffchonki: INFERNO_APP_CONTENT='deffchonki.js' npm run build && zip -r deffchonki.zip build
scripts.zip-sibc: INFERNO_APP_CONTENT='sibc.js' npm run build && zip -r sibc.zip build
scripts.zip-all: npm run zip-nails && npm run zip-deffchonki && npm run zip-sibc
